headline: Does Federal Realty Still Offer Value After Recent Gains and Mixed REIT Sector Sentiment?
summary: Wondering if Federal Realty Investment Trust is actually good value at around $102 a share, or if the easy gains are already gone? Here is a walkthrough of what the market is pricing in, and what the fundamentals suggest about its underlying value. The stock has inched up 0.6% over the last week and 5.3% over the past month, but it is still down 6.1% year to date and 5.1% over the last year, even after delivering a 15.7% and 46.9% total return over the last 3 and 5 years. Recently, investors...
